overview: Alminin is the son of a cracker entrepreneur who was laid off from his company due to the impact of the corona virus pandemic. Alminin who sees his father every day has to go to the market because he delivers crackers, he is quite concerned about the condition of his old father. One day his father had an accident that made Alminin have to think again to ease the work of his parents. Thanks to hard work, assisted by his sister, the cracker business went smoothly. Even so, it does not mean that Alminin does not get into trouble from his neighbors, because for some reason he has become the object of gossip from the neighbors and makes him restless.
title: Sinyal
